scripts.build:html:dev: npm run json:dev && npm run nunjucks && npm run mjml
scripts.build:html:prod: npm run json:prod && npm run nunjucks && npm run mjml
scripts.build:html:test: npm run json:test && npm run nunjucks && npm run mjml
scripts.build:html:stress: npm run json:stress && npm run nunjucks && npm run mjml
scripts.start: npm run build:html:dev && npm run build:img:dev && concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch:html" "npm run watch:data" "npm run watch:img" "npm run serve"
scripts.start:stress: npm run build:html:stress && npm run build:img:dev && concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch:html:stress" "npm run watch:data:stress" "npm run watch:img" "npm run serve"
scripts.deploy:build: rm -rf ./dist && mkdir dist && npm run build:html:prod && npm run build:img:prod && npm run version && npm run revision && rm -rf ./tmp
scripts.deploy:build:test: rm -rf ./dist && mkdir dist && npm run build:html:test && npm run build:img:prod && npm run version && npm run revision && rm -rf ./tmp
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:build && npm run deploy:push && npm run deploy:aws
scripts.deploy:test: npm run deploy:build:test && npm run deploy:push && npm run deploy:aws
